   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_sni_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Callback functions
   32: -export([all/0,
   33:          groups/0,
   34:          init_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   40: 
   41: %% Testcases
   42: -export([no_sni_ext/1,
   43:          sni_match/1,
   44:          sni_no_match/1,
   45:          no_sni_ext_fun/1,
   46:          sni_match_fun/1,
   47:          sni_no_match_fun/1,
   48:          sni_fail_fun/1,
   49:          sni_crash_fun/1,
   50:          dns_name/1,
   51:          ip_fallback/1,
   52:          no_ip_fallback/1,
   53:          dns_name_reuse/1,
   54:          customize_hostname_check/0,
   55:          customize_hostname_check/1,
   56:          sni_no_trailing_dot/0,
   57:          sni_no_trailing_dot/1,
   58:          hostname_trailing_dot/0,
   59:          hostname_trailing_dot/1
   60:         ]).
   61: 
   62: %% Apply export
   63: -export([send_and_hostname/1,
   64:          recv_and_certificate/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 6}).
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   78:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   80:     ].
   81: 
   82: groups() ->
   83:     [
   84:      {'tlsv1.3', [], sni_tests()},
   85:      {'tlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   86:      {'tlsv1.1', [], sni_tests()},
   87:      {'tlsv1', [], sni_tests()},
   88:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   89:      {'dtlsv1', [], sni_tests()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: sni_tests() ->
   93:     [no_sni_ext, 
   94:      sni_match, 
   95:      sni_no_match,
   96:      no_sni_ext_fun, 
   97:      sni_match_fun, 
   98:      sni_no_match_fun,
   99:      sni_fail_fun,
  100:      sni_crash_fun,
  101:      dns_name,
  102:      ip_fallback,
  103:      no_ip_fallback,
  104:      dns_name_reuse,
  105:      customize_hostname_check,
  106:      sni_no_trailing_dot,
  107:      hostname_trailing_dot].
  108: 
  109: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  110:     catch crypto:stop(),
  111:     try crypto:start() of
  112:         ok ->
  113:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  114:             Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  115:             {#{server_config := ServerConf,
  116:                client_config := ClientConf},
  117:              #{server_config := LServerConf,
  118:                client_config := LClientConf}} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_sni_configs(),
  119:             %% RSA certs files needed by *dot cases
  120:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert([{client_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]},
  121:                                         {client_local_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | LClientConf]},
  122:                                         {sni_server_opts, [{sni_hosts, [{Hostname, ServerConf}]} | LServerConf]}
  123:                                        | Config0])
  124:     catch _:_  ->
  125:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  126:     end.
  127: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  128:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  129: 
  130: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  131:    ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  132: 
  133: end_per_suite(_) ->
  134:     ssl:stop(),
  135:     application:stop(crypto).
  136: 
  137: init_per_testcase(customize_hostname_check, Config) ->
  138:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  139:     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(keep_version),
  140:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  141:     Config;
  142: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  143:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  144:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  145:     ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version)]),
  146:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  147:     Config.
  148: 
  149: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: no_sni_ext(Config) ->
  156:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  157:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  158:     ClientOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  159:                                               proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  160:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  161: 
  162: no_sni_ext_fun(Config) ->
  163:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  164:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  165:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, []) end,
  166:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  167:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  168:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  169:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  170: 
  171: sni_match(Config) ->
  172:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  173:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  174:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  175:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  176:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  177: 
  178: sni_match_fun(Config) ->
  179:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  180:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  181:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, unrecognized) end,
  182:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  183:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  184:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  185:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  186: 
  187: sni_no_match(Config) ->
  188:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  189:     [_ | DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  190:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  191:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  192:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  193:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  194: 
  195: sni_no_match_fun(Config) ->
  196:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  197:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  198:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, unrecognized) end,
  199:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  200:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, "localhost"} |
  201:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  202:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, unrecognized_name).
  203: 
  204: sni_fail_fun(Config) ->
  205:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  206:     [_| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  207:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ,
  208:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  209:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  210:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions ++ [{sni_fun, fun(_Domain) -> [{versions, ['tlsv1.5']}] end}],
  211:                          ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure),
  212:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions ++  [{sni_fun, fun(_Domain) -> [{verify, foobar}] end}],
  213:                          ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  214: 
  215: sni_crash_fun(Config) ->
  216:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  217:     [_| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  218:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> Domain = nomatch end,
  219:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  220:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  221:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  222:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  223: 
  224: 
  225: 
  226: dns_name(Config) ->
  227:     Hostname = "OTP.test.server",
  228:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  229:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  230:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  231:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  232:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  233:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  234:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  235:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  236:                                                                                critical = false}]},
  237:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  238:                                     client_chain =>
  239:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  240:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  241:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  242:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  243:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  244:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  245:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  246:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer},
  247:                                      {server_name_indication, Hostname} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  248:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, "foo"} | ClientConf],
  249:                           undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  250:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, disable} | ClientConf],
  251:                         undefined, Config).
  252: 
  253: ip_fallback(Config) ->
  254:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  255:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  256:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  257:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  258:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  259:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  260:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  261:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  262:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  263:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  264:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  265:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname},
  266:                                                                                            {iPAddress, IPList}],
  267:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  268:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  269:                                     client_chain =>
  270:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  271:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  272:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  273:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  274:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  275:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  276:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  277:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  278:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config),
  279:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], list_to_atom(Hostname), Config).
  280: 
  281: no_ip_fallback(Config) ->
  282:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  283:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  284:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  285:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  286:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  287:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  288:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  289:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  290:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  291:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  292:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  293:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  294:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  295:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  296:                                                   ]},
  297:                                     client_chain =>
  298:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  299:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  300:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  301:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  302:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  303:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  304:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  305:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config, handshake_failure),
  306:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config, handshake_failure).
  307: 
  308: dns_name_reuse(Config) ->
  309:     SNIHostname = "OTP.test.server",
  310:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  311:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  312:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  313:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  314:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  315:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  316:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  317:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, SNIHostname}],
  318:                                                                                critical = false}
  319:                                                                  ]},
  320:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  321:                                                   ]},
  322:                                     client_chain =>
  323:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  324:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  325:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  326:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  327:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  328:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  329: 
  330:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  331: 
  332:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  333: 
  334:     Server =
  335: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  336: 				   {from, self()},
  337: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  338: 				   {options, ServerConf}]),
  339:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  340:     Client0 =
  341: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  342:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  343: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  344:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  345:                                                               {server_name_indication, SNIHostname} | ClientConf]}]),
  346:     receive
  347:         {Server, _} ->
  348:             ok
  349:     end,
  350: 
  351:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  352: 
  353:     %% Make sure session is registered
  354:     ct:sleep(1000),
  355: 
  356:     Client1 =
  357: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  358:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  359:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  360:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]}]),
  361: 
  362:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, handshake_failure),
  363:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0).
  364: 
  365: 
  366: customize_hostname_check() ->
  367:     [{doc,"Test option customize_hostname_check."}].
  368: customize_hostname_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  369:     Ext = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  370:                         extnValue = [{dNSName, "*.example.org"}],
  371:                         critical = false}
  372:           ],
  373:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  374:       client_config := ClientOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa, [{server_chain,
  375:                                                                                [[], 
  376:                                                                                 [],
  377:                                                                                 [{extensions, Ext}]
  378:                                                                                ]}], 
  379:                                                                         Config, "https_hostname_convention"),
  380:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts0, Config),
  381:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts0, Config),  
  382:                                         
  383:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  384:   
  385:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  386:                                         {host, Hostname},
  387: 					{from, self()}, 
  388: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  389: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  390:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  391:     
  392:     CustomFun = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https),
  393:     
  394:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  395:                                         {host, Hostname},
  396: 					 {from, self()}, 
  397:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  398:                                         {options,
  399:                                          [{verify, verify_peer},
  400:                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"},
  401:                                           {customize_hostname_check, 
  402:                                            [{match_fun, CustomFun}]} | ClientOpts]
  403: 					 }]),    
  404:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  405:     
  406:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  407:                                         
  408:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  409:                                                {host, Hostname},
  410:                                                {from, self()}, 
  411:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  412:                                                {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  413:                                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"} | ClientOpts]}
  414:                                               ]),    
  415:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client1, handshake_failure).
  416: 
  417: sni_no_trailing_dot() ->
  418:       [{doc,"Test that sni may not include a triling dot"}].
  419: sni_no_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  420:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  421:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  422: 
  423:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  424: 
  425:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  426:                                  {from, self()},
  427:                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  428:                                  {options, [ServerOpts]}]),
  429: 
  430:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  431: 
  432:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  433: 					      {host, Hostname},
  434: 					      {from, self()},
  435:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  436: 					      {options,
  437:                                                [{server_name_indication, Hostname ++ "."} | ClientOpts]}]),
  438:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unrecognized_name).
  439: 
  440: hostname_trailing_dot() ->
  441:     [{doc,"Test that fallback sni removes trailing dot of hostname"}].
  442: 
  443: hostname_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  444:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  445:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  446:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname0} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  447: 
  448:     case trailing_dot_hostname(Hostname0) of
  449:         {ok, Hostname} ->
  450:             Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  451:                                                 {from, self()},
  452:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  453:                                                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
  454:             Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  455:             Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  456:                                                 {host, Hostname},
  457:                                                 {from, self()},
  458:                                                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  459:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
  460: 
  461:             ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  462: 
  463:             ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  464:             ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
  465:         {skip, _ } = Skip ->
  466:             Skip
  467:     end.
  468: 
  469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: %% Callback Functions ------------------------------------------------
  471: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  472: send_and_hostname(SSLSocket) ->
  473:     ssl:send(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  474:     case  ssl:connection_information(SSLSocket, [sni_hostname]) of
  475: 	{ok, [{sni_hostname, Hostname}]} ->
  476: 	    Hostname;
  477: 	{ok, []} ->
  478: 	    undefined
  479:     end.
  480: 
  481: recv_and_certificate(SSLSocket) ->
  482:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  483:     {ok, PeerCert} = ssl:peercert(SSLSocket),
  484:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = {rdnSequence, Subject}}} 
  485: 	= public_key:pkix_decode_cert(PeerCert, otp),
  486:     ?CT_LOG("Subject of certificate received from server: ~p", [Subject]),
  487:     rdn_to_string(rdnPart(Subject, ?'id-at-commonName')).
  488: 
  489: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  490: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  491: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  492: basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Expected) ->
  493:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  494:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {?MODULE, send_and_hostname, []}},
  495:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  496:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  497:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  498:                                         {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  499:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, recv_and_certificate, []}},
  500:                                         {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  501:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Expected, Client,  "server Peer cert"),
  502:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  503:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  504: 
  505: basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Alert) ->
  506:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  507:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  508:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  509:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  510:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  511:                                               {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  512:                                               {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  513:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client, Alert),
  514:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  515:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  516: 
  517: successful_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->
  518:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  519:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  520:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  521:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  522:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  523:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  524:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  525:                                         {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  526:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  527:                                         {options, ClientOptions}]),
  528:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  529:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  530:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  531: 
  532: unsuccessful_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config, Alert) ->
  533:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  534:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  535:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  536: 					      {from, self()},
  537: 					      {options, ServerOptions}]),
  538:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  539:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  540: 					      {host, Hostname},
  541: 					      {from, self()}, 
  542: 					      {options, ClientOptions}]),
  543:     
  544:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, Alert).
  545: 
  546: host_name(undefined, Hostname) ->
  547:     Hostname;
  548: host_name(Hostname, _) ->
  549:     Hostname.
  550: 
  551: trailing_dot_hostname(HostName) ->
  552:     case lists:member($., HostName) of
  553:         true ->
  554:             case lists:last(HostName) =/= $. of
  555:                 true ->
  556:                     {ok, HostName ++ "."};
  557:                 false ->
  558:                     {ok, HostName}
  559:             end;
  560:         _ ->
  561:             {skip, "Trailing dot conf not possible"}
  562:      end.
  563: 
  564: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, Expect) ->
  565:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "", Expect).
  566: 
  567: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, CurrentData, ExpectedData) ->
  568:     receive
  569:         {ssl, SSLSocket, Data} ->
  570:             NeweData = CurrentData ++ Data,
  571:             case NeweData of
  572:                 ExpectedData ->
  573:                     ok;
  574:                 _  ->
  575:                     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, NeweData, ExpectedData)
  576:             end;
  577:         Other ->
  578:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  579:     after 4000 ->
  580:             ct:fail({timeout, CurrentData, ExpectedData})
  581:     end.
  582: 
  583: rdnPart([[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type=Type, value=Value} | _] | _], Type) ->
  584:     Value;
  585: rdnPart([_ | Tail], Type) ->
  586:     rdnPart(Tail, Type);
  587: rdnPart([], _) ->
  588:     unknown.
  589: 
  590: rdn_to_string({utf8String, Binary}) ->
  591:     erlang:binary_to_list(Binary);
  592: rdn_to_string({printableString, String}) ->
  593:     String.
